appeal_contents_lower_20801001:
You can defeat the legends on Pasio
to win medals!
appeal_contents_lower_20801002:
You can collect Eggs and hatch
Pokémon to form sync pairs with!
appeal_contents_lower_20851001:
See an all-new story featuring Lillie
and her family!
appeal_contents_lower_20851002:
You can use your Bug-type sync pairs
to defeat a powerful opponent—Azelf!
appeal_contents_lower_20851003:
What sort of trouble is Team Rocket up
to at the summer fireworks festival?!
appeal_contents_lower_21001002:
You can get gems daily as first-time
completion rewards and 5★ Scout Tickets!
appeal_contents_lower_21001003:
You can collect Eggs and hatch
Pokémon to form sync pairs with!
appeal_contents_lower_21001004:
Use Flying- and Poison-type sync
pairs to defeat the powerful Tapu Bulu!
appeal_contents_lower_21001006:
Complete the event, and team up with
Zinnia & Rayquaza!
appeal_contents_lower_20901001:
Reignite a burned-out Flint with a
blinding clash of Electric-type moves!
appeal_contents_lower_20901002:
Get candy with Acerola and Hilbert,
and check out the Midnight Parade!
appeal_contents_lower_20901003:
You can collect Eggs and hatch
Pokémon to form sync pairs with!
appeal_contents_lower_21001001:
Push your limits with Flying-type
sync pairs!
appeal_contents_lower_21001005:
How do battles differ from contests?
Lisia gets a valuable lesson in battling!
appeal_contents_lower_21101001:
You can collect lots of rewards by
earning points from battles!
appeal_contents_lower_21101002:
You can complete the event to form a
sync pair with Solgaleo!
appeal_contents_lower_21101003:
Use your Grass- and Steel-type sync
pairs to defeat the mighty Regirock!
appeal_contents_lower_21101004:
You can collect decorations to trade for
items and get rewards in special areas!
appeal_contents_lower_21201001:
Theme skills arrive! Plus, you can get
vouchers to see special stories!
appeal_contents_lower_21201002:
You can complete the event to
team up with Silver & Ho-Oh!
appeal_contents_lower_21201003:
You can get cards to trade for items!
Rewards await in rare special areas!
appeal_contents_lower_21201004:
Team Break interferes as Hilbert and
Hilda attempt to search for N!
appeal_contents_lower_30101002:
Take on the powerful Cresselia with
the help of your Dark-type sync pairs!
appeal_contents_lower_30101003:
You can complete the event to
team up with Giovanni & Mewtwo!
appeal_contents_lower_30101004:
You can complete the event to team
up with Professor Sycamore & Xerneas!
appeal_contents_lower_30101001:
You can gather ingredients to trade for items!
Plus, special presents from Serena and Dawn?!
appeal_contents_lower_30101005:
You can get great rewards by
completing missions!
appeal_contents_lower_21051000:
You can grab two log-in bonuses for
loads of 5★-Guaranteed Scout Tickets!
appeal_contents_lower_30201002:
You can use your best Fairy-type
sync pairs to best the mighty Latias!
appeal_contents_lower_30201004:
You can complete the event to
team up with Cyrus & Palkia!
appeal_contents_lower_30201005:
Battle Pasio’s Trainers! Plus, you can
get vouchers to see special stories!
appeal_contents_lower_30201006:
Iris discovered something essential to
being a Champion. What could it be?
appeal_contents_lower_30201001:
Dive into an all-new story featuring
Leon and Marnie!
event_appeal_contents_lower_30301001:
What exciting new trials have Mallow,
Lana, and Kiawe created on Pasio?
event_appeal_contents_lowerr_30301002:
You can use your Electric-type sync
pairs to take on the mighty Tornadus!
event_appeal_contents_lower_30301005:
You can have daily chances to get
Eggs in these once-a-day battles!
event_appeal_contents_lowerr_30401001:
Push your limits with Steel-type
sync pairs!
event_appeal_contents_lowerr_30401002:
Ghetsis wants to be a father to N
again. What is he plotting on Pasio?
event_appeal_contents_lowerr_30401003:
Who will claim the title of greatest
dragon master?
event_appeal_contents_lowerr_30401004:
You can complete challenging battles
to win medals!
event_appeal_contents_lower_30301003:
This is your chance to have some
heated battles with Unova’s best!
event_appeal_contents_lowerr_30401005:
Now’s your chance to prepare for the
calamities about to hit Pasio!
event_appeal_contents_lowerr_30401006:
You can complete the special event
to gather weather surveys!
appeal_contents_lower_30501001:
New region rotation battles under
way! You can join the challenge daily!
appeal_contents_lower_30501002:
Work with Maxie and Archie
to take down Groudon and Kyogre!
appeal_contents_lower_30501003:
Fight through challenging battles with
strong opponents to claim your victory!
appeal_contents_lower_30501004:
Who will win the contest? You can get
special rewards from the prize box!
event_appeal_contents_lowerr_30401007:
You can check out the News screen
for details on the special event!
appeal_contents_lower_30601001:
The greatest battle, better than ever
before! Aim for victory! All aboard!
appeal_contents_lower_30601002:
Power up with 3★ gear now available
in the Exchange Items menu!
appeal_contents_lower_30601003:
You can use your Rock- and Water-
type sync pairs to challenge Moltres!
appeal_contents_lower_30601004:
What summer memories have Gloria
and Marnie created on Pasio?
appeal_contents_lower_30601006:
Team up with Steven and Lyra to
become Pasio’s superstars!
appeal_contents_lower_30601005:
You can power up Bugsy & Scyther
with limited-time item exchanges!
appeal_contents_lower_30601007:
You can log in and get gems for
three days!
